title: Sasha (DJ)
summary: Alexander Paul Coe (born 4 September 1969), known professionaly as Sasha,[lower-alpha 1] is a Welsh DJ and record producer. He is best known for his live events and electronic music as a solo artist, as well as his collaborations with British DJ John Digweed as Sasha & John Digweed. He was voted as World No.⁠ ⁠1 DJ in 2000 in a poll conducted by DJ Magazine.[4] He is a four-time International Dance Music Awards winner, four-time DJ Awards winner and Grammy Award nominee.[5]
